definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The paper explored the manufacturing process of substitute wollastonite flour for barium sulfide to produce the alkyd putty.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了用硅灰石粉代替硫酸钡制造醇酸腻子。

sentences.english: The process and mechanism of solidification of wollastonite silica sol slurry are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了硅灰石硅溶胶浆体的固化过程及机理。

sentences.english: The geological characteristics of Baishiyan sillimanite ore deposit are systematically described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文系统地介绍了白石岩硅灰石矿床地质特征。

sentences.english: The modification effects of wollastonite on the properties of the SLS part were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了硅灰石对尼龙12烧结材料的填充改性作用。

sentences.english: Objective To study cellular compatibility and bone-inducing activity of the plasma sprayed wollastonite coating.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究硅灰石涂层的细胞相容性和成骨诱导能力。

sentences.english: The calcium materials are added in fly-ash , and the architectural ceramic glass that crystal phase is wollastonite is gotten.
sentences.chinese: 在粉煤灰中加入钙质材料，制成硅灰石型微晶玻璃。

sentences.english: Wollastonite is a fine-property plastics filler of reinforcing modification.
sentences.chinese: 硅灰石是一种性能优良的塑料增强改性填料。

definition: rutile (mineral form of titanium oxide TiO2)
